name: Import Your Post
author: Bratched

sections.description:
With this plugin, you can import and auto traduct single post.This plugin can import item from WordPress or Joomla sites. You can also import HTML directly.The items with source code are managed properly and images are directly imported into the media library. Article becomes identical to a directly entered with WordPress interface. Very usefull to autotraduct post in multisite.

  • Import a post from a Worpress or Joomla Url
  • Import Tags and Categories
  • Import linked Image as Media
  • Import correctly source code description in Post
  • Translate Post (with Bing Translator)
  • Import from a source HTML page
sections.installation:
• Download the .zip of the plugin and extract the contents.
  • Upload it to the WordPress plugin directory and activate the plugin.
  • Even easier, just go to Plugins > Add New and search for “Import Your Post”.
  • You can change settings and view help under Settings > Import Your Post in the WordPress Admin.
sections.faq:
Could I use Google Translate API ?

No, at this time, only Bing Translator is supported.

Are there limit with translator ?

Limit is the Microsoft Bing Translator Limit. You need to register to have a Free Client Account and translate imported Posts.

short_description: Import Your Post can import and auto traduct single post from an other site (Worpress, Joomla,...). Very usefull to autotraduct post in multisite.

upgrade_notice: Make sure to upgrade to the latest release when possible to ensure you avoid bugs others have found and enjoy new features.
